comment:
LED fixture:A type of lighting fixture that uses Light Emitting Diodes (LEDs) as the source of light. LEDs are energy-efficient and have a longer lifespan compared to other types of lighting.
fluorescence lamp:A type of lighting fixture that uses fluorescence to produce light. Fluorescent lamps are commonly used in commercial and residential settings due to their energy efficiency and brightness.
units of electricity per hour:The amount of electrical energy consumed by a light fixture in one hour. It is measured in units such as kilowatt-hours (kWh) and indicates the power consumption of the light source.
